text:
GetYourGuide ☆ Berlin - Zurich ☆ Full Time ☆ ONSITE

With over 25,000 things to do, GetYourGuide is the world's largest marketplace for tours and activities, and we keep growing every day. We are totally data driven and are ramping our our engineering capacity.

Looking for: Data scientists ☆ DevOps ☆ Front-end engineers ☆ Back-end engineers

We currently use technologies such as Chef, Nginx, Apache, HAProxy, PHP, MySQL, Elasticsearch, RabbitMQ, PostgreSQL, and Node.js

Find more about us and the job openings on our career page http://careers.getyourguide.com/
